evidence: Because of that negative k in the convolution sum, one function needs to be flipped - think of it like flipping your right hand so you see the back of it.

concepts.term: For n equals zero, you align the flipped function with the origin, multiply the overlapping points, then sum the products - this gives you the output y of zero.

evidence: your right hand represents the other - this will be h of n, the impulse response
